title: Was Alexandria Okasio-Cortez "Chas" in Amazon outside its New York Convention area?
subtitle: The newly elected Congresswoman from New York was a strong opponent of Amazon plans, as were many others.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Republic of the United States of America, Alexandria Ocacio Cortez, is a "chasing" of the Amazon, far from establishing a second headquarters in its region.
